title: Emerald and Diamond Chandbali Earrings - Pachala Rallu & Vajrala Jhumka
materials: High purity (22K) Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
G-H Color). Total Emerald weight: 5.41 carats.
features: Traditional Chandbali design reimagined with a modern flair. Features a floral motif at the top, followed by three cascading emerald clusters each surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The diamond arrangement utilizes a cluster setting to maximize brilliance. The lower portion displays a leaf-like pattern, adding to the overall grace and sophistication of the piece.
occasions: or upscale social events. These earrings add a touch of regal elegance to any traditional or contemporary attire.
description: The exquisite blend of traditional design with modern setting techniques makes this Chandbali a timeless piece. The use of high-quality Zambian Emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds ensures exceptional sparkle and luster. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, known for its rich jewelry heritage, these earrings represent both luxury and cultural significance. The comfortable weight allows for extended wear without compromising style.
